scripts.start: echo 'Starting server...' && ls -la && echo 'Contents of current directory:' && pwd && echo 'Looking for dist/index.js...' && ls -la dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'dist directory not found' && node dist/index.js
scripts.build: echo '=== BUILD START ===' && echo 'Current directory:' && pwd && echo 'Installing dependencies...' && yarn install && echo 'Running TypeScript build...' && tsc && echo 'Build completed. Contents of dist:' && ls -la dist/ && echo '=== BUILD END ==='
